title: Rekindled: The Complete Collection
description: *This book is out of print.*Jealousy and misunderstandings allow a so-called friend to seek out the cracks in a relationship and use them to manipulate and interfere, intent on ruining a little boy's life before he has even drawn a breath.Euphoria to the depths of a dark abyss of pain awaits them.Their journey is a carefully woven story thread of murder, paternity, jealous lovers and family members, and misunderstandings.Can their love be rekindled?(Due to sexual content and language, this book is recommended for 17+ Genre: Adult Contemporary Women)
author: Jo Briggs
